title: Control the Elder Brain
content:
he Elder Brain Objectives

Dominate the Netherbrain.

Whoever has control over the Netherbrain will hold unspeakable power. We could dominate it and have a thousand kingdoms at our command.

Quest Complete Descriptions

We dominated the Netherbrain. We chose to destroy the Netherbrain instead of dominating it.

Control the Elder Brain Walkthrough

Dominate the Elder Brain is a subquest of Confront the Elder Brain.
